WorkItem.Description: When using this XML, and doing a Maximum/10x Optimizer solve, the result returned is lower than the currently-equipped set (by 30 dps).  Granted that's a very small amount of relative error, but perhaps the currently-equipped set should be processed as a solution to avoid "regressions".
WorkItem.Summary: [Rawr 5.0.2][Mage][Fire] 10x accuracy Optimizer solve returns suboptimal result

Comments.Message: The reason why lower values are shown is so you have an idea of how much uncertainty there is in the optimizer. Certain cases can be particularly hard to optimize.
I'm not sure if this is just due to some changes on my end, but optimizing this specific file I get an increase from 75483.84 to 76122.88 in optimizer.
